countries.name: Spain
countries.unvaccinated: Unvaccinated visitors from the United Kingdom can enter Spain with a negative COVID-19 test result.
countries.vaccinated: Vaccinated visitors from the United Kingdom can enter Spain without restrictions.
countries.test: Unvaccinated visitors from the United Kingdom must present a negative RT-PCR (NAAT) or Antigen (quick-test) test taken 72 hours before departing to Spain. Fully vaccinated visitors with approved vaccination certificates do not need to present a negative COVID-19 test.
countries.quarantine: Visitors from the United Kingdom are not required to quarantine after entering Spain.

countries.name: Portugal
countries.unvaccinated: Unvaccinated visitors from the United Kingdom need to provide a negative COVID-19 test result and quarantine to enter Portugal.
countries.vaccinated: Vaccinated visitors from the United Kingdom can enter Portugal without restrictions.
countries.test: Unvaccinated visitors from the United Kingdom must present a negative RT-PCR (NAAT) test taken 72 hours before departing to Portugal. Fully vaccinated visitors with approved vaccination certificates do not need to present a negative COVID-19 test.
countries.quarantine: Unvaccinated visitors from the United Kingdom will need to quarantine for 14 days upon entering Portugal. Fully vaccinated visitors with approved vaccination certificates do not need to quarantine.

countries.name: France
countries.unvaccinated: Unvaccinated visitors from the United Kingdom will not be allowed to enter France.
countries.vaccinated: Fully vaccinated visitors from the United Kingdom can enter France without restrictions.
countries.test: Unvaccinated visitors from the United Kingdom must present a negative Antigen (quick-test) test taken 24 hours before departing to France. Fully vaccinated visitors with approved vaccination certificates do not need to present a negative COVID-19 test.
countries.quarantine: Unvaccinated visitors from the United Kingdom will need to quarantine for 7 days upon entering France. Fully vaccinated visitors with approved vaccination certificates do not need to quarantine.

countries.name: Italy
countries.unvaccinated: Unvaccinated visitors returning from Italy will need to quarantine for 10 days upon entering the United Kingdom.
countries.vaccinated: Fully vaccinated visitors with approved vaccination certificates do not need to quarantine.
countries.test: Visitors from the United Kingdom must present a negative RT-PCR (NAAT) or Antigen (quick-test) test taken 48 OR 72 hours before departing to Italy.
countries.quarantine: Visitors from the United Kingdom will need to quarantine for 5 days upon entering Italy.

countries.name: Greece
countries.unvaccinated: Unvaccinated visitors from the United Kingdom can enter Greece with a negative COVID-19 test result.
countries.vaccinated: Fully vaccinated visitors from the United Kingdom can enter Greece without restrictions.
countries.test: Unvaccinated visitors from the United Kingdom must present a negative RT-PCR (NAAT) or Antigen (quick-test) test taken 72 for RT-PCR (NAAT) and 48 Antigen (quick-test) hours before departing to Greece. Fully vaccinated visitors with approved vaccination certificates do not need to present a negative COVID-19 test.
countries.quarantine: Visitors from the United Kingdom are not required to quarantine after entering Greece.

countries.name: Germany
countries.unvaccinated: Unvaccinated visitors from the United Kingdom will not be allowed to enter Germany.
countries.vaccinated: Fully vaccinated visitors from the United Kingdom can enter Germany without restrictions.
countries.test: Unvaccinated visitors from the United Kingdom must present a negative RT-PCR (NAAT) or Antigen (quick-test) test taken 72 for RT-PCR (NAAT) and 48 Antigen (quick-test) hours before departing to Greece. Fully vaccinated visitors with approved vaccination certificates do not need to present a negative COVID-19 test.
countries.quarantine: Unvaccinated visitors from the United Kingdom will need to quarantine for 10 days upon entering Germany. Fully vaccinated visitors with approved vaccination certificates do not need to quarantine.

countries.name: USA
countries.unvaccinated: Unvaccinated visitors from the United Kingdom will not be allowed to enter Germany.
countries.vaccinated: Fully vaccinated visitors from the United Kingdom can enter Germany without restrictions.
countries.test: Visitors from the United Kingdom must present a negative RT-PCR (NAAT) or Antigen (quick-test) test taken 72 hours before departing to the United States.
countries.quarantine: Visitors from the United Kingdom are not required to quarantine after entering the United States.

countries.name: Ireland
countries.unvaccinated: Unvaccinated visitors from the United Kingdom will not be allowed to enter Ireland.
countries.vaccinated: Fully vaccinated visitors from the United Kingdom can enter Ireland without restrictions.
countries.test: Unvaccinated visitors from the United Kingdom must present a negative RT-PCR (NAAT) test taken 72 hours before departing to Ireland. Fully vaccinated visitors with approved vaccination certificates do not need to present a negative COVID-19 test.
countries.quarantine: Unvaccinated visitors from the United Kingdom will need to quarantine for 14 days upon entering Ireland. Fully vaccinated visitors with approved vaccination certificates do not need to quarantine.
